title: Sustainability Education Curriculum Design Based on Flame-Retardant Bamboo Materials

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of fundamental chemistry concepts and sustainability
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments using digital devices for pre-service professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the scientific principles of flame-retardant bamboo as a sustainable material and apply chemical concepts
Learners can analyze and restructure instructional design phases using mixed research methods (Exploratory Sequential Design)
Learners can develop and validate learning stages for flame-retardant bamboo topics according to the educational reconstruction model (MER)
Learners can measure self-efficacy achievement of 85% or higher and improvements in sustainability awareness.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
